name: You and Me: Tethered
description:
Play this game in fullscreen for the best experience.

Description:

You and Me: Tethered is a puzzle arcade game where you play as two connected spirits: Yu'Na and Mi'Ya. You switch back and forth between characters, both of which are connected by a spiritual link. Traverse across this positively friendly plane, and do your best to avoid the negative dark energy; lest you sever the tether.

Gameplay:

Swap between characters to delicately maneuver them between obstacles without severing their spiritual bond! Reach the other character to pass a level.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move

R: Restart

M: Switch between Characters

Credits:

Jacob (Jakku) - Designer/Artist

Armon Walker (CreatorRedA) - Designer/Programmer

Michelle (melody27) - Composer

All original art!

All original music!

3 Levels

A College Game Jam submission
